snippet: Hoyt, a bartender who worked at Speaker John A. Boehner’s country club in Ohio, is facing federal charges after being accused of threatening to shoot Mr. Boehner and poison his drinks, according to court documents.
lead_paragraph: Hoyt, a bartender who worked at Speaker John A. Boehner’s country club in Ohio, is facing federal charges after being accused of threatening to shoot Mr. Boehner and poison his drinks, according to court documents.

headline.main: Court Documents in the Case of Michael R. Hoyt
